valhelsia.chat.first_start_message: Welcome to Valhelsia 5! The modpack is currently in beta, is not yet complete and bugs may be present.
valhelsia.chat.discord: Join us on our Discord server.
valhelsia.tooltip.how_get_jade: This gemstone can be found in the Jungle biomes.
valhelsia.tooltip.backpack: Contains 27 inventory slots and 1 upgrade slot.
valhelsia.tooltip.gold_backpack: Contains 27 inventory slots and 3 upgrade slots.
valhelsia.tooltip.diamond_backpack: Contains 27 inventory slots and 5 upgrade slots.
valhelsia.tooltip.netherite_backpack: Contains 27 inventory slots and 7 upgrade slots.
